posts.title: 3D Environment Designer
posts.subtitle: VR Environment Design
posts.description: We are looking for a 3D Environment Designer to create immersive environments for a Virtual Reality training platform. Responsibilities include gathering environment requirements, creating 3D models and textures, and designing interactive VR elements.
requirements: Proven experience in 3D environment design for VR or gaming
Strong portfolio of 3D modeling and texturing work
Ability to design interactive elements for VR training use cases

posts.title: VR Training Module Developer
posts.subtitle: Interactive Module Development
posts.description: We are hiring a VR Training Module Developer to build interactive modules for a Virtual Reality training platform. The role includes developing training scenarios, implementing VR user interactions, and integrating feedback and performance tracking.
requirements: Experience building VR training or simulation modules
Ability to implement complex VR interactions
Familiarity with data tracking and feedback systems

posts.title: Healthcare Software Analyst
posts.subtitle: Requirements Gathering & Design
posts.description: We are seeking a Healthcare Software Analyst to lead the requirements gathering and design phase of an AI-powered healthcare chatbot. Responsibilities include defining chatbot objectives, collecting compliance requirements, designing conversation flows, and preparing UI/UX wireframes.
requirements: Experience in healthcare or medical software projects

posts.title: AI Chatbot Developer
posts.subtitle: Prototype Development
posts.description: We are hiring an AI Chatbot Developer to build the prototype for a healthcare-focused chatbot. The role involves setting up the development environment, integrating NLP for symptom checking, developing backend APIs, and creating the frontend chatbot interface.
requirements: Proven experience in chatbot or AI system development
Strong backend and frontend development skills
Ability to integrate NLP models into real applications
